channel.title: [PI] Little help please? Lol
channel.description:
On Project Insanity base i was looking for something i've saw before and cant find it. It is where you type ::yell when you are a donator (members = 2 in char file) and when you do ::yell it would say something like
[Donator]Jim: hey guys this is what it'd say
i want it to say [Veteran]Jim: hey guys this is what i WANT it to say
Does anyone know how i can change that? :D thank you ahead of time

item.title: [PI] Little help please? Lol
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

There’s no other place it could be in. In commands.java try searching for memberStatus = 2 or something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Little help please? Lol
item.dc:creator: @aaronmead aaronmead
item.description:
@aaronmead wrote:

Try search your whole server for [Donator], it might show up

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Little help please? Lol
item.dc:creator: @Hextix Hextix
item.description:
@Hextix wrote:

But look, if you’d listen to me i could tell u :\

I did that, and its not there, i tried lowercase and uppercase D in Donator, its not in commands.java …

In the character file, memberstatus = 2 means donator, and if you type ::yell in game with memberstatus 2 beside your name on the left is [Donator]

Please someone help me find this :[

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Little help please? Lol
item.dc:creator: @David_The_Drummer David The Drummer
item.description:
@David_The_Drummer wrote:

Lord Typhis:

Commands.java just search for [donator]

… src>server>model>player>packets>commands.java, ctrl+f and look for donator, and just change it to veteran

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Little help please? Lol
item.dc:creator: @Hextix Hextix
item.description:
@Hextix wrote:

^ that didn’t work… I want it to say Veteran instead of Donator… Just like when your the owner beside your name is Owner you know? I dont know where to find it…

Read full topic
